text: A dumbwaiter (lit. "silent waiter") is a small freight elevator. Dumbwaiter may also refer to: * Lazy Susan, a small rotating table to serve food on a table * The Dumb Waiter, a 1957 one-act play by Harold Pinter * Dumb Waiters, a 1980 album by The Korgis * "Dumb Waiters" (song), a 1981 song by the Psychedelic Furs
title: Dumbwaiter (disambiguation)
